channel.title: What this site could do with
channel.description: is a like/dislike button. Just make it an option to hide it in your profile settings.

item.title: What this site could do with
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Teh Spede, post:24, topic:433709”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=536426.msg3924522#msg3924522 date=1330088157]
Bad enough people care about rep. We don’t need kiddies raging about people disliking their posts.
[/quote]You’re probably the only one that cares about rep on mitb. Moparscape I can understand but not this side.[/quote]

Clearly you didn’t understand the context of the post then. This is all one website. This suggestion applies to both moparisthebest and moparscape, so his post is entirely valid.

Read full topic

item.title: What this site could do with
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Radeon:

I thought it was the number of joints one had continuously, because how the fak would you come up with a number

i believe this is what he was referring to, specifically

What do these numbers in titles mean? [7]? [4]? What are these?!

The number indicates how high the commenter or poster is on a scale of 0 to 10, 0 being sober and 10 being the absolute highest you’ve ever been before. See the reddit alien highness chart on the sidebar on the right. Sometimes, people will add other information as well, such as if they’re drunk or on some other drug. It is also generally accepted that if someone is at a 10, they probably will have a rather hard time using a computer so it is rare to see posts affixed with a 10(or more) that aren’t exaggerating.

Source: notabadname

Read full topic

@Phillipe wrote:

I’m about a [7] right now, so I’ll make this shit simple to avoid me speaking more shit than usual.

Couldn’t hurt having it in a system where it could display a “hot topic” dependant on thread likes, fuck having user comment likes - it isn’t facebook.

item.title: What this site could do with
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

We’re not turning this site into a hipster community where all we do is press a like or dislike button, are we?

Hell no.

This is not Reddit damnit!

To anyone in support of this:
If you don’t like someones post, there’s a quick reply box-a proper reply which is abundantly more useful feedback than a simple Like/Dislike.

Read full topic
